title: The Best Street Style From Milan Fashion Week
text:
The Fashion Month marathon continues in the penultimate European city: Milan. With brands like Prada, Fendi, and Moschino showing in the Italian capital, the super-stylish editors, influencers, and celebrities came out in full force.

Every season, the peacocks of Italy teach the rest of us a lesson about looking refined, whether they’re wearing perfectly tailored suits or understated outfits punctuated with brightly colored bags. But this time, we also saw some extreme looks, like the full-on goth beauty moment above. One stylish person wore a zebra-print face mask and head-to-toe Fendi, while another sported that $520 cashmere bra that post-breakup Katie Holmes made us all obsessed with. And then there was Luka Sabbat, who simply wore a ragged black T-shirt with some black pants.

Our street-style photographer Nicky Zeng is following the European fashion all month. Below, scroll to see the best looks from Milan Fashion Week.
description: Nicky Zeng photographs the coolest, wildest, and most stylish looks at Milan Fashion Week Spring 2020 for the Cut.
